content: video tutorial loose fit balaclava / oversize hood this oversize hood / balaclava combines style and coziness making it perfect for chilly days or as a thoughtful handmade gift whether you re new to knitting or looking for a quick and satisfying project this guide has you covered what s in this tutorial ~simple easy-to-follow instructions ~tips for achieving the perfect loose fit ~techniques suitable for beginners and advanced knitters materials used yarn aran / worsted weight yarn about 150g gauge 14sts x 19rows / 10x10 cm 4x4 inch needles 40 / 60 cm circular knitting needles 6 mm or size needed to meet gauge ~get as close to the stitches as you can~ if you have more sts change to a larger size if you have fewer sts use smaller needles other tools 2 stitch markers tapestry needle scissors tape measure written summary https //ko-fi com/post/loose-fit-balaclava--oversize-hood-beginner-frie-g2g0169mp9
